title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Specialist Community-Based
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Specialist Community-Based 
Disability Services (Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial 
Functions) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 29 November 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited specialist community-based disability service (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2023 (2) order come operation 29 november 2023

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

(2) References to the Department of Health contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under an Act and relating to any administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department child equality disability integration youth (2) reference department health contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Health by or under section 3
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Health by or under section 3 
of the Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) are transferred to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

(2) References to the Minister for Health contained in any Act or 
instrument made under an Act and relating to any functions transferred by this 
Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references 
to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister health section 3 disability act 2005 (no 14 2005) transferred minister child equality disability integration youth (2) reference minister health contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Health is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, the name of 
the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth shall, in 
so far as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be 
substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Health or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [595] 3

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Health may, in so far as it relates to 
functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth, be carried on or completed from such 
commencement by the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister health may far relates function transferred order minister child equality disability integration youth carried completed commencement minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it 
was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Health contained in the memorandum
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Health contained in the memorandum 
and articles of association of any company and relating to any function 
transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 7 reference minister health contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister child equality disability integration youth

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Health in connection with 
the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth and, accordingly, without 
any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement- 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth by this Article which, on 
the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Health, on the request of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth, be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [595]
